game_info.name: Dome Keeper Clone
game_info.description: Roguelike survival combining tower defense with mining. Mine underground for resources between enemy waves, return to dome to defend with laser weapon. Upgrade keeper and dome with collected resources.

core_loop.description: Mine phase (dig underground, collect iron/water/cobalt) -> Return to dome -> Defense phase (laser fires at enemies) -> Spend resources on upgrades -> Repeat deeper until victory or dome destruction

combat_profile.how_to_attack: During defense phase, mouse aims dome laser. Hold click to fire continuous beam. Laser damages and stuns enemies. Keeper cannot attack directly.
